sections.heading: Article 1: Introduction and Scope
sections.content:
Engineers-incubator s.r.o. ("we," "us," or "our") is dedicated to upholding the highest standards of privacy and data protection. This Privacy Policy outlines our obligations and your rights concerning the collection, processing, and protection of your personal data when you interact with our website, https://euhub-ai.com (the "Service").

This policy is drafted in strict accordance with Regulation (EU) 2016/679 (the General Data Protection Regulation or "GDPR") and the Slovak Act No. 18/2018 Coll. on Personal Data Protection (the "Act").

sections.heading: Article 2: Data Controller
sections.content:
Company Name: Engineers-incubator s.r.o.
Company ID (IČO): 53 741 200
Registered Address: Horná 67, 974 01 Banská Bystrica, Slovenská republika
Contact Email for Privacy Inquiries: hello@euhub.sk

sections.heading: Article 3: Data Collection and Purpose of Processing
sections.content:
We adhere to the principle of data minimization and collect personal data only for specified, explicit, and legitimate purposes.

Information You Provide Directly:
• Account and Profile Information: Full Name, Email Address, Username, and Hashed Password. Optional data: LinkedIn URL, Telegram username.
  Purpose: To create and manage your account, provide our services, and facilitate user interaction.
• Communications: Name, contact details, and message content.
  Purpose: To respond to inquiries and maintain a record of correspondence.
• Marketing Subscriptions: Email Address.
  Purpose: To send marketing communications to which you consented.

Information Collected Automatically:
• Log and Device Data: IP, browser type, device info, OS, referring URLs.
  Purpose: Security, analysis, improved functionality.
• Usage Data & Cookies: Data from cookies and similar technology.
  Purpose: Website operation, preferences, analytics, marketing. Detailed in Cookie Policy.

sections.heading: Article 4: Legal Basis for Processing
sections.content:
• Contractual Necessity: Article 6(1)(b) GDPR
• Consent: Article 6(1)(a) GDPR
• Legitimate Interests: Article 6(1)(f) GDPR
• Legal Obligation: Article 6(1)(c) GDPR

sections.heading: Article 5: Data Disclosure and Transfers
sections.content:
• Third-Party Service Providers: Hosting, payments, analytics.
• Legal Compliance: Disclosure if required by law or authority.
• International Transfers: Protected via Standard Contractual Clauses.

sections.heading: Article 6: Data Retention
sections.content: We retain data only as long as necessary unless law requires longer retention.

sections.heading: Article 7: Your Data Protection Rights
sections.content:
• Right to Access
• Right to Rectification
• Right to Erasure ("Right to be Forgotten")
• Right to Restrict Processing
• Right to Data Portability
• Right to Object
• Right to Withdraw Consent
• Right to Lodge a Complaint – Supervisory Authority:
  Úrad na ochranu osobných údajov Slovenskej republiky,
  Hraničná 12, 820 07 Bratislava 27, Slovenská republika,
  https://dataprotection.gov.sk/uoou/

sections.heading: Article 8: Data Security
sections.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data from loss, alteration, unauthorized disclosure, or access.

sections.heading: Article 9: Children's Privacy
sections.content: Our Service is not directed to children under 16. We do not knowingly collect their data. If we become aware, we delete it promptly.

sections.heading: Article 10: Amendments to This Policy
sections.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. The updated version will show a revised "Effective Date" and will apply immediately.

sections.heading: 1. Introduction and Agreement
sections.content: Welcome to euhub-ai.com (the "Site"), operated by Engineers-incubator s.r.o. ("we," "us," or "our"). These Terms and Conditions ("Terms") govern your access to and use of our Site. By accessing or using the Site, you agree to be bound by these Terms in their entirety. If you do not agree with any part of these Terms, you must not use this Site.

sections.heading: 2. Intellectual Property Rights
sections.content: All content present on this Site, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of Engineers-incubator s.r.o. or its content suppliers and is protected by Slovak and international copyright laws. You are granted a limited, non-exclusive license to access and view the content for personal, non-commercial use only.

sections.heading: 3. User Obligations and Acceptable Use
sections.content:
You agree to use the Site only for lawful purposes. You are prohibited from:

• Using the Site in any way that could damage, disable, or impair the Site.
• Attempting to gain unauthorized access to any part of the Site or its related systems.
• Introducing any viruses, trojans, or other material that is malicious or technologically harmful.

sections.heading: 4. Disclaimers and Limitation of Liability
sections.content:
The Site is provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis. We make no warranties, expressed or implied, regarding the accuracy, reliability, or completeness of the Site's content.

To the fullest extent permitted by Slovak law, Engineers-incubator s.r.o. shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages, including loss of profits or data, arising from your use of, or inability to use, this Site. This limitation does not apply to damages caused by gross negligence or willful misconduct.

sections.heading: 5. Links to Third-Party Websites
sections.content: Our Site may contain links to third-party websites. These links are provided for your convenience only. We have no control over the content of these sites and accept no responsibility for them or for any loss or damage that may arise from your use of them.

sections.heading: 6. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
sections.content:
These Terms and any dispute arising out of or in connection with them shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Slovak Republic.

You agree that the competent courts located in Banská Bystrica, Slovak Republic, shall have exclusive jurisdiction to settle any dispute which may arise out of or in connection with these Terms.

sections.heading: 7. Amendments
sections.content: We reserve the right to amend these Terms at any time. We will notify users of any changes by posting the new Terms on this Site. Your continued use of the Site after such changes constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms.

sections.heading: 8. Contact Information
sections.content:
Company: Engineers-incubator s.r.o.
Address: Horná 67, 974 01 Banská Bystrica, Slovenská republika
Email: hello@euhub.sk

sections.heading: 1. What are Cookies?
sections.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device (computer, tablet, smartphone) when you visit a website. They are widely used to improve website functionality and provide information to website owners.

sections.heading: 2. How We Use Cookies
sections.content: Our website, euhub-ai.com, uses cookies to distinguish you from other users, provide you with a good browsing experience, and help us improve our site. By using our site, you agree to the use of strictly necessary cookies. For all other cookies, we require your explicit consent.

subsections.content:
These cookies are essential for you to navigate the website and use its features. They do not require your consent.
Example: sessionid – Used to maintain your session while browsing.

These cookies collect anonymous information about how visitors use our website, such as which pages are visited most frequently. This helps us improve the functionality of our website. We will only use these cookies if you give us your consent.
Example: Google Analytics (_ga, _gid) – Used to collect statistics about how visitors use the site. All data is anonymized.

These cookies are used to track visitors across websites. The intention is to display advertisements that are relevant and engaging to the individual user. We will only use these cookies if you give us your consent.
Example: Meta (Facebook) Pixel (_fbp) – Used to deliver targeted ads on Meta platforms after you have visited our site.

sections.heading: 4. Your Choices and Cookie Management
sections.content: You can manage your cookie preferences at any time through our cookie consent banner. You can also configure your browser to reject all or some cookies, or to alert you when websites set or access cookies. Please note that if you disable or reject strictly necessary cookies, some parts of this website may become unavailable or not function properly.

sections.heading: 5. Contact Us
sections.content: If you have any questions about our use of cookies, please contact us at hello@euhub.sk.
